thread.title: Contract talks with Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil are on hold - Arsene Wenger
thread.title_full: Contract talks with Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil are on hold - Arsene Wenger

author: Mattias Karen, Arsenal correspondent
title: Contract talks with Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil are on hold - Arsene Wenger
text:
Lineups and Stats 
"We have decided to focus on the end of the season and talk about it during in the summer. 
"Once you don't get an agreement and that lasts it's not good, so it's better you sit down during the summer." 
Wenger's own future is also uncertain as his contract expires after the current campaign, but the Frenchman said he had "no news" about his plans. 
Speaking after Saturday's defeat at West Bromwich Albion he said he knew what he would do in future and would announce that "very soon." 
But he added that he was concentrating on turning the team's poor form around after four losses in their last five Premier League matches. 
"No matter how long I stay I will be committed and completely focused. How long I stay doesn't really matter because as long as I'm there I'm completely focused on achieving the best with the club," he said. 
"At the moment we are going through a difficult period on the results, so I think it's much more important to focus on getting it right again." 
Mattias is ESPN FC's Arsenal correspondent. Follow him on Twitter: @MattiasKaren.
